# Experiments
```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot(ruuvi.data, 
                aes(x = paivamaara,
                    y = liikelaskuri, 
                    color = ruuvitag_name)) + geom_point()


ggplot2::ggplot(ruuvi.data, 
                aes(x = paivamaara,
                    y = kiihtyvyys_y, 
                    color = ruuvitag_name)) + geom_point()

```

```{r}

                    y = lampotila_C, 
                    color = ruuvitag_name)) + geom_point()

```
